articles.title: A&W rings in the new year with a new $6 Value Meal available for a limited time
articles.author: Itai Buenahora
articles.summary: A&W will launch the 'Buddy Bundle' as part of their new promotional deals in 2025. The bundle will be available for a limited time.

articles.title: Briel Shaving: Revolutionizing Grooming With Precision and Comfort
articles.author: Gordana V
articles.summary: BrielShaving offers manual razors known for sharp blades and ergonomic handles, electric shavers engineered for smooth shaves with advanced technology like hypoallergenic blades, and grooming accessories formulated to enhance the overall shaving experience. BrielShaving integrates advanced technology into its product line, such as multi-directional heads and lithium-ion batteries in electric shavers, and focuses on sustainability by using replaceable heads and recyclable packaging.

articles.title: Del Taco Plays into Value By Adding Two NEW Burritos to the Del's Real Deal$(™) Menu, Each Under $3! Plus, The NEW Dragon Fruit Blueberry Poppers Lineup  Jan. 2, 2025 22:00
articles.summary: Del Taco is launching new products, including two new burritos named Chipotle Grilled Chicken Burrito and Bean, Rice & Cheese Burrito, as additions to the Del's Real Deal menu. Del Taco also introduces Del's Bundles which are curated combinations of menu items. Furthermore, the company is launching Dragon Fruit Blueberry Poppers beverages in Sprite, Lemonade, and Shake flavors.

articles.title: Lidl shoppers can get £5 off their grocery bill with easy move
articles.author: Nawal Abdisamad
articles.summary: Lidl is offering a £5 discount on grocery bills for selected Lidl Plus App users when they spend £25 or more. The coupon is valid for 14 days and redeemable at Lidl GB branches (excluding Northern Ireland) after activation in the app. Lidl Plus members can unlock additional savings and perks based on monthly spending.

articles.title: Lidl shoppers can get £5 off their grocery bill with easy move
articles.author: Nawal Abdisamad
articles.summary: Lidl is offering a \u00a35 discount on grocery bills for Lidl Plus App users who spend \u00a325 or more in a single transaction. This coupon is valid for 14 days and can be found in the app's rewards section, exclusively for Lidl Plus account holders. The offer is available in Lidl GB branches (excluding Northern Ireland).

articles.title: Odd Burger Closes $430k in First Tranche of Private Placement
articles.author: Odd Burger Corporation
articles.summary: Odd Burger Corporation completed the first tranche of a non-brokered private placement, offering units consisting of common shares and purchase warrants. The company manufactures and distributes plant-based protein and dairy alternatives through its Odd Burger restaurant locations and consumer-packaged goods line. These restaurants use state-of-the-art cooking technology and automation solutions to deliver a fast-food experience.

articles.title: New Year mattress sales are here! Save up to $948 at DreamCloud, Saatva, Purple
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Several mattress companies, including DreamCloud, Saatva, Purple, and others, are offering New Year sales with significant discounts. Shoppers can save up to $948 at DreamCloud, and other brands like Amerisleep, Brooklyn Bedding, Helix Sleep, Leesa, Puffy, Sleep Number, and Zoma Sleep are providing various promotions and discounts on their mattresses.

articles.title: New Year mattress sales are here! Save up to $948 at DreamCloud, Saatva, Purple
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Several mattress companies, including Saatva, Nectar, Tempur-Pedic, Cocoon by Sealy, Casper, Tuft & Needle, Nolah, Purple, and Avocado Green, are offering New Year mattress deals. These deals cater to various sleeper types and budgets, including memory foam, latex, and hybrid options. Considerations for purchasing a mattress include trial periods, delivery services, warranty, and customer reviews.

articles.title: New Year mattress sales are here! Save up to $948 at DreamCloud, Saatva, Purple
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Several mattress companies including Saatva, Nectar, Tempur-Pedic, and others are offering New Year sales and discounts. Amerisleep is offering up to $500 off any mattress, Brooklyn Bedding is offering 25% off sitewide, Helix Sleep provides 25% off and free bedding, Leesa is offering 25% off and two free pillows, Puffy provides up to $1,350 off, Sleep Number has lowest prices, and Zoma Sleep offers 25% off with free shipping and returns.

articles.title: New Year mattress sales are here! Save up to $948 at DreamCloud, Saatva, Purple
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Several mattress brands including Saatva, Nectar, Tempur-Pedic, Cocoon by Sealy, Casper, Tuft & Needle, Purple, and Avocado are offering discounts for the New Year. The article informs customers to consider trial periods, white glove delivery service, old mattress removal, warranty, customer reviews, and return policy when buying a new mattress.

articles.title: This Colorado dad started a company that makes inclusive diapers for kids with disabilities
articles.author: WPTV
articles.summary: Youth Crews, a new youth diaper brand based in Colorado, has officially launched this month. The company aims to provide more inclusive sizing options for kids. Brady Crandall, the founder, realized the need for such a product after caring for his daughter.

articles.title: Redmi Turbo 4 Officially Released, Powered by Mediatek Dimensity 8400 Ultra Chipset
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched the Redmi Turbo 4 smartphone in China on January 2nd, 2025. The device features a Mediatek Dimensity 8400-Ultra chipset, a 6.77-inch LTPS OLED screen, and a dual-camera system with a 50MP main camera. The Redmi Turbo 4 is expected to launch globally as the Poco X7 Pro on January 9th.

articles.title: Lewisville to bid King Arthur Boulevard traffic calming project in spring 2025
articles.author: Jonathan Perriello
articles.summary: Apple is introducing new Apple Watch bands to celebrate the new year. These new bands are designed to refresh the look of the Apple Watch and offer users additional customization options.

articles.title: Best problem solving products from Amazon Canada
articles.summary: The article showcases various newly introduced products available on Amazon Canada. These include the Hoto Electric Spin Scrubber, Vankada Heating Pad, Hanni Shower Scarf, Waterpik Cordless Advanced Water Flosser, Hero Cosmetics Mighty Patch, Sally Hansen Instant Cuticle Remover, Patella Tendon Knee Strap, Tangle Teezer Ultimate Detangler Hairbrush, Kitchenaid Albany Mini Oven Mitt Set, Jigoo Mattress Vacuum, Gorilla Spray Adhesive, Nori Press Travel Steam Iron, e11ement Hypochlorous Acid Skin Spray, Smart Labels Colour Coded Scannable Stickers, La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Barrier Repairing Lip Balm, Nellie's Dish Butter, Snooz Smart White Noise Machine, Oneisall Automatic Cat Feeder, Lise Watier Portfolio 4-in-1 Corrector and OXO Good Grips Pop Cereal Dispenser Set. These items are designed to solve everyday problems and enhance convenience, from cleaning to personal care and organization.

articles.title: AI Startup Rembrand Raises $23 Million In Series A Round of Funding
articles.author: Trishla Ostwal
articles.summary: Rembrand has secured $23 million in Series A funding to broaden its AI-powered capabilities and launch new business models. With the funding, Rembrand plans to expand its expertise from social media to placing ads in connected TV and movies. Rembrand will also open its AI Studio to all creators in the first quarter, allowing them to add virtual products to their videos.

articles.title: 3 buzzed-about beauty products we tried this week from Revlon, Hermès and JVN
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Revlon rereleased its hydrating balm with a new exterior. Hermès Hermessence Fragrance Collection, first launched in 2004, merges unique scents. JVN launched Rapid Repair Bonding Gloss, an in-shower shine-enhancing hair treatment.

articles.title: 3 buzzed-about beauty products we tried this week from Revlon, Hermès and JVN
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Revlon rereleased its hydrating balm with a new exterior. Hermès' Hermessence Fragrance Collection, originally launched in 2004, combines unique scents. JVN introduced the Rapid Repair Bonding Gloss, a shine-enhancing hair treatment designed to repair bonds in 60 seconds.

articles.title: 3 buzzed-about beauty products we tried this week from Revlon, Hermès and JVN
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Revlon re-released its hydrating balm with a new exterior. Hermès launched Hermessence Fragrance Collection in 2004, combining unique scents. JVN introduced Rapid Repair Bonding Gloss, an in-shower hair treatment enhancing shine and repairing bonds in 60 seconds, suitable for all hair types.

articles.title: 3 buzzed-about beauty products we tried this week from Revlon, Hermès and JVN
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Revlon has rereleased its hydrating balm with a new chic exterior, featuring a buttery-soft texture and a kiss of color. Hermès launched the Hermessence Fragrance Collection in 2004, merging unique scents and including perfume creations such as Volynka leather and violet, honey and amber (Ambre Narguile), and rose and rhubarb (Rose Ikebana).

articles.title: The Roomba Robot Vacuum Is ‘A Little Piece Of Wizardry' And $100 Off For A Limited Time
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: The Roomba robot vacuum, particularly the Q0120 and iRobot 675 models, is highlighted for its cleaning capabilities on various floor types and smart home integration features like Alexa compatibility and app scheduling. Currently, the product is available with a 40% discount on Amazon for a limited time.

articles.title: Pokémon Go January 2025 promo code
articles.summary: Niantic is releasing a promo code for Pokémon Go. The code provides free items, including Poké Balls and special items. It also includes Pokémon encounters and avatar accessories.

articles.title: Cleaning fans run to supermarkets for miracle dish spray that's just like viral £11 American buy
articles.author: Digital Fabulous Editor
articles.summary: Fairy, a P&G brand, has launched "Skip the Soak Power Spray" in the UK. This new dish soap product is designed to cut through grease without soaking, offering a quick and effortless cleaning solution. It is available in supermarkets like Tesco, Morrisons and Asda.

articles.title: Blinkit rolls out 10-minute ambulance service in Gurugram
articles.author: ETtech
articles.summary: Blinkit has launched a 10-minute ambulance service, starting in Gurugram. The service will be available through the Blinkit app and is equipped with essential life-saving equipment and personnel. Blinkit plans to expand this service to all major cities within the next two years.

articles.title: Panasonic Nanoe Hair Dryer: Tested and Reviewed
articles.author: Sarah Hostetler
articles.summary: The Panasonic Nanoe Folding Hair Dryer, priced at $85, features Nanoe technology for hair hydration and an oscillating cap for heat dispersion. The dryer, a travel version of Panasonic's 1875-watt model, folds for compact storage. A limited-edition travel bag is available when purchasing directly through Panasonic.

articles.title: Amazon has a secret deal on this portable car battery jump starter that makes it cheaper than ever —but only for a limited time
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a limited-time deal on the AstroAI S8 Car Battery Jump Starter, priced at $34 after a 37% discount and an additional clickable coupon. The jump starter provides 1,500 amps of portable power, suitable for various vehicles and 12V equipment, and also functions as a power bank and LED flashlight.

articles.title: Here are the 70+ local businesses that opened in 2024
articles.author: Mac Bell
org: Hey Dude Hell In A Bucket Brewery
Dirty Dough Rutters Stone Cold Creamery
Yah Brew Plaza Azteca Wing Stop
L.L. Bean Cracked Pot Coffee Shop
articles.summary: Numerous businesses, including Urban Air, Metal Supermarkets, Cafe Fresco, Chick-fil-A, and many others, opened in the Midstate in 2023. These new establishments span various sectors, from restaurants and pubs to shops and services, introducing new product and service offerings to the local market. The list includes Royal Farms, AJ's Market, Annapurna Grocery & Clothing Store and many other new businesses.

articles.title: Sky teases launch of new ‘smarter, brighter and better than ever' mystery product coming in weeks
articles.author: Jamie Harris
articles.summary: Sky is preparing to launch a new product, described as "smarter, brighter and better than ever." This new product might be related to TV, broadband, mobile, or smart security. Recently Sky also launched a new cheaper TV subscription tier, costing only 50p a day.

articles.title: Optimism bias
articles.author: Reynaldo C. Lugtu
articles.summary: The article presents examples of companies whose new product launches or strategic expansions were influenced by optimism bias. Google Glass's launch in 2013 exemplifies overestimation of market readiness. Conversely, Tesla's success with electric vehicles demonstrates how optimism can fuel resilience and innovation, and Salesforce's cloud computing strategy demonstrates how optimism can fuel innovation, and WeWork's rapid expansion exemplifies risks of unchecked optimism.

articles.title: This Genius Brand Created a Plastic-Free Women's Razor That Will Give You Your Smoothest Shave Ever
articles.author: Taylor Lane
articles.summary: Nimbi offers ethically responsible razors aimed at providing a smooth shave. Consumers are encouraged to add Nimbi razors to their routine for an improved shaving experience.

articles.title: Arcsky Introduces the X55 V2: New American-Made Aircraft with Enhancements for Industrial Drone Applications
articles.author: Drone Life
articles.summary: Arcsky has launched the X55 V2, incorporating new features to address customer feedback and improve operational efficiency. The new version represents an advancement over its predecessor.

articles.title: Shop ghd's January sale — up to 20% off the Helios, Chronos, Glide and more
articles.author: Clare Stephenson
articles.summary: Ghd is offering up to 20% off on select hot tools, styling products, and gift sets until January 12, including discounts on the latest launch, the Duet Blowdry Hair Dryer. The sale features deals on straighteners like the Original Straightener and Chronos, as well as hair dryers such as the Helios. Styling tools like the Glide and Rise are also included in the sale.

articles.title: How to use Vanilla gift card online for seamless shopping
articles.author: Techpoint
articles.summary: Vanilla Gift is offering a brand-new product, likely a type of gift card, aimed at providing a convenient payment solution for online shopping. This allows customers to make purchases without immediately accessing their credit cards.

articles.title: Mr. Bubble Delivers a Sensory Experience for Kids & Adults with New Bath Dough, Foam Soaps & Retro Bubble Gum Candle in Celebration of National Bubble Bath Day, Jan. 8
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Mr. Bubble is launching new products: Mr. Bubble Bath Dough, limited edition Foam Soaps, and a bubble gum-scented retro tin candle. These products offer sensory experiences for kids and adults. Additionally, all Mr. Bubble products are 30% off online from January 2-8 in celebration of National Bubble Bath Day.

articles.title: Author Post: How to Create Your Startup's X-Factor
articles.author: Colin C. Campbell
articles.summary: Companies like Domino's, Tesla, Carvana, Drivetime, National Car Rental, and Reebok launched or updated their products or services by identifying and addressing bottlenecks or expanding into new niches. Tesla eliminated the traditional car dealership model, while Carvana and Drivetime reduced friction in the car-buying process. Reebok found success by creating sneakers for women's aerobics.

articles.title: Asda slashes prices of over 2,500 products including top brands sold online and in stores
articles.author: Levi Winchester
articles.summary: Asda initiated a price reduction campaign, decreasing costs on over 2,500 products. Morrisons is expanding its Aldi and Lidl price match scheme to encompass over 500 items, which includes everyday groceries.

articles.title: Amazon offering 20% off 'outstanding' dehumidifier that 'works magic' on damp and mould
articles.author: Catherine Addison-Swan
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of a dehumidifier, which helps protect homes from dampness and save on energy bills. The dehumidifier features an intelligent humidity sensor, laundry mode, and a carbon filter. Customer reviews on Amazon have both positive and negative experiences with the product regarding noise level and effectiveness.

articles.title: Asda slashes price of over 2,500 products to help post-Christmas budgets
articles.author: Katrina Chilver
articles.summary: Asda has announced a price reduction on over 2,500 essential items, averaging a 26% discount, both in-store and online, including brands like Cathedral City, Dolmio, and Persil. Morrisons has expanded its Aldi and Lidl price match scheme to over 500 items, assuring prices match or are lower than Aldi and Lidl.

articles.title: China rolls into the future with AI patrol bots
articles.author: Martha Kehagias
articles.summary: Logon Technology has developed the RT-G, an AI-powered spherical patrol robot capable of navigating various terrains and immobilizing suspects. DEEP Robotics introduced Lynx, a hybrid robo-dog designed for emergency rescues and security operations, combining the agility of a four-legged walker with the speed of wheels. Both products represent advancements in robotic law enforcement.

articles.title: Motorola launching budget Moto G05 in India, to offer features you get with Rs 25,000 phones
articles.summary: Motorola is set to launch the Moto G05 in India on January 7, a budget smartphone with premium features. The Moto G05 features a 90Hz display, Dolby Atmos sound, a vegan leather finish, and water touch technology. The smartphone is powered by the MediaTek Helio G81 Extreme chipset, paired with 4GB of RAM and a 5,200mAh battery.

articles.title: Your Secret Weapon for Creating Stunning Business Images
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Skylum is offering a Luminar Neo Lifetime Bundle. This offering aims to elevate the user's brand.

articles.title: Del Taco Plays into Value By Adding Two NEW Burritos to the Del's Real Deal$(™) Menu, Each Under $3! Plus, The NEW Dragon Fruit Blueberry Poppers Lineup
articles.summary: Del Taco is introducing new flavor-packed burritos to its 'Del's Real Deal' menu, along with three value-packed 'Del's Bundles' designed to offer savings on popular menu items. These additions aim to enhance customer experience and provide more options for individuals, small groups, and families.

articles.title: 15 Forgotten Fast Food Items That Need a Comeback
articles.author: Dana Daly
articles.summary: McDonald's introduced the McDLT, a burger with hot and cold ingredients separated in distinct compartments. Its innovative packaging and fresh lettuce became symbolic of 1980s innovation.

articles.title: Newline Launches Signage Pro Digital Signage Software
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Newline introduces a new cutting-edge software platform designed for creating impactful digital signage. The software offers robust features and customization options with an intuitive and accessible design, empowering users of all technical levels to design and deploy visually compelling content.

articles.title: Reviewers ‘Couldn't Be More Impressed' With This Brand-New Robot Vacuum at Target — It's Bound to Sell Out
articles.author: Savannah Born
articles.summary: The robot vacuum cleaner features a dual anti-tangle system with a main brush and a side brush, making it suitable for households with long hair or pet hair. It can navigate double-layer thresholds up to four centimeters high, and its front camera allows real-time monitoring of its cleaning process. The robot maps the space and accounts for surface changes, obstacles, pets and no-go zones.

articles.title: Cizzle Brands Makes Public Markets Debut on Cboe Canada
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cizzle Brands, a health and wellness company founded by John Celenza, is experiencing significant growth. The company's "innovative pipeline of products" is generating high demand, leading to partnerships with numerous retailers. This success has prompted Cizzle Brands to list on the Cboe Canada exchange.

articles.title: 2025 Suzuki Swift Hybrid Plus review
articles.author: Scott Collie
articles.summary: Suzuki has launched the fourth-generation Swift with a starting price below $25,000. The new Swift features new interior technology, more space, and a more efficient mild-hybrid powertrain. The mid-range Swift Plus includes extra safety kit and offers efficiency comparable to more expensive hybrid vehicles.

articles.title: Innovative Commode Designs for Modern Bathrooms: A Guide to Style and Functionality
articles.summary: The article introduces several innovative commode designs including wall-mounted, smart, compact/corner, freestanding, bidet, and eco-friendly toilets. These commodes offer features like space-saving designs, advanced technology integrations (bidet functions, heated seats, smartphone app controls), and water-saving mechanisms, catering to various needs and preferences for modern bathrooms.

articles.title: Titan Edge XL Gummies : Performance Backed by Nature
articles.summary: Titan Edge XL Gummies are introduced as a new dietary supplement designed to boost energy, enhance stamina, and support overall wellness. Marketed toward adults seeking improved physical performance, the supplement is a chewable gummy form.

articles.title: This ‘Lifesaver' Robot Vacuum-Mop That Leaves Floors ‘Spotless' Is 70% Off at Amazon
articles.author: Neha Tandon
articles.summary: Zcwa is introducing its Robot Vacuum and Mop, equipped with 360-degree vision, adaptive cleaning for various floor types, and personalized cleaning schedules via an app. The robot vacuum also features a mopping mode and automatic return to its charging dock. Furthermore, Dyson's cordless vacuum is on sale.

articles.title: The Best Shoe Cleaners of 2025: Reviewed
articles.author: Israel Hayom Shopping Team
articles.summary: Several shoe cleaner products and kits are reviewed, including boot scrapers, sneaker cleaning kits, and all-natural shoe cleaners. The products feature various components like cleaning solutions, brushes, and microfiber towels, designed for different materials and cleaning needs. Key aspects include eco-friendliness, material compatibility, and ease of use, as evaluated by JPOST ratings.

articles.title: LG to unveil its 'AI Home' concept vehicle at CES 2025
articles.author: John Xavier
articles.summary: LG Electronics is introducing the 'Lifestyle Solution for Mobility' concept vehicle at CES 2025, featuring the LG Mobility Experience (MX) platform. This AI-powered platform transforms the vehicle interior into a customizable space, offering subscription-based access to various lifestyle services and appliance integrations. The MX platform aims to extend the home environment into the vehicle.

articles.title: More Singapore tech start-ups looking to grow presence in the US: Singapore Business Federation
articles.author: Nasyrah Abdul Rohim
articles.summary: Strutt, a Singapore-based start-up, is developing an autonomous personal mobility device (PMD) and plans to test its prototype in the US market, specifically at the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas. Similarly, Scorpio Electric, a homegrown electric motorcycle manufacturer, is also eyeing the US market and anticipating favorable policies on electric vehicles and innovation under the Trump administration.

articles.title: Titan Edge XL Gummies Review Simple Health Solutions in 2025 !
articles.summary: Titan Edge XL Gummies are introduced as a new dietary supplement designed to boost energy, enhance stamina, and support overall wellness. These chewable gummies offer a convenient alternative to traditional pills or powders for adults seeking improved physical performance.

articles.title: Stuff Meets... Halo vacuum chief Paul Bagwell on stress, taekwondo and geekdom
articles.author: Rachael Sharpe
articles.summary: Halo, founded by Paul Bagwell, is developing innovative consumer products, including a vacuum cleaner. Halo focuses on solving consumer frustrations by providing innovative products without gimmicks or added costs. Their vacuum cleaner aims to address challenges of traditional bagless models.

articles.title: 'I bought £5 Too Good To Go bag from M&S – and couldn't believe what was inside'
articles.author: Samantha Bartlett
articles.summary: The 'Too Good To Go' service connects consumers with restaurants and shops selling surplus food at discounted prices. Customers have shared their experiences with the service, highlighting the value of 'Too Good To Go' bags from stores like Marks and Spencer and Morrisons. Morrisons acknowledges that standards fell short in one instance and apologized to the customer.

articles.title: BYD Denza 9 luxury SUV design trademarked in India. Will it come to India?
articles.author: Ht Auto Desk
articles.summary: BYD is planning to introduce the Denza 9, a luxury new energy vehicle with a hybrid powertrain, and potentially the all-electric Denza N9. Additionally, BYD has patented designs for the Bao 9 sportscar and Bao 3 off-road electric SUV, which features a dual-motor four-wheel drive system and BYD's Blade battery packs.

articles.title: OfBusiness unveils AI-enabled digital platform Nexizo to drive B2B commerce
articles.summary: OfBusiness has launched Nexizo.AI, a new platform designed to foster growth for SMEs within the manufacturing and infrastructure sectors. The platform aims to enable the discovery of new opportunities, gather market insights, and drive B2B commerce by connecting buyers and providing software solutions.

articles.title: Beauty lovers are racing to buy this £2.99 lip balm that's 'identical' to Clinique Black Honey: 'My new favourite - subtle and hydrating!'
articles.author: LAYLA TURNER
articles.summary: Nivea has a lip balm called Cherry Shine Lip Balm which beauty lovers say is almost identical to Clinique's Black Honey Almost Lipstick. Nivea's Cherry Shine Lip Balm is formulated with vitamin E and ethically-sourced Shea butter for 24-hour moisture, with a subtle cherry aroma and red tint. The vegan formula lip balm costs £2.99.

articles.title: LG Electronics to unveil AI-based mobility platform at CES 2025
articles.author: 김보람
articles.summary: LG Electronics will introduce its new AI-based mobility experience (MX) platform at CES 2025. This platform uses AI and IoT to transform cars into personalized spaces for work, relaxation, or entertainment. A concept vehicle based on the MX platform will be displayed under the theme of "Lifestyle Solution for Mobility."

articles.title: Singapore Airlines teams up with Le Labo for new amenity kits
articles.author: Marga Manlapig
articles.summary: Singapore Airlines has launched a new business class amenity kit in collaboration with Le Labo Fragrances. The kit, offered on flights six hours or longer, includes a hand pomade, face mist, and lip balm, all made with vegan ingredients. The kit comes in a waxed cotton canvas pouch that can be reused as a travel document holder.

articles.title: Heavenly Provision: Connecting You to God's Promises of Abundance and Fulfillment
articles.summary: Heavenly Provision is introduced as a spiritual guide that helps individuals unlock blessings through prayer, meditation, and affirmations. It includes a comprehensive guide, prayer techniques, meditation practices, and community support, currently available for $39 with a lifetime money-back guarantee. The product aims to provide clarity, abundance, and fulfillment in users' lives.

articles.title: The new year brings new vaping restrictions to Kentucky
articles.author: Wuky
articles.summary: The FDA has authorized for sale tobacco and menthol products from makers Logic, NJOY, and Vuse. This authorization allows these products to be marketed for sale, while the FDA has denied marketing to over one million flavored nicotine devices. The law will be enforced by the state Alcoholic Beverage Control agency and violations carry a $1000 fine.

articles.title: Unlock the Key to Crafting Impressive Business Visuals
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Skylum introduces Luminar Neo, an AI-powered photo editing software designed for business professionals to enhance visual content such as product images and social media posts. The software offers features like Skyᴬᴵ and Relightᴬᴵ to quickly replace skies and enhance lighting, along with extensions for panoramas and background removal. A limited-time bundle includes a lifetime license, add-ons like Color Harmony LUTs and Wintertime Overlays, and a video course.

articles.title: LG PRESENTS VISION FOR EXPANDING ITS "AI HOME SOLUTIONS" INTO MOBILITY SPACES AT CES 2025  Jan. 2, 2025 09:00
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching the "Lifestyle Solution for Mobility" concept vehicle featuring the LG Mobility Experience (MX) platform at CES 2025. The MX platform integrates LG's AI Home solutions into mobility spaces, creating a connection between home and vehicle. LG plans to offer the MX platform as a subscription service, making it accessible to a broader audience.

articles.title: LG Electronics will introduce the 'Mobility Experience (MX) Platform' at the world's largest consume..
articles.author: Park Seung Ju
articles.summary: LG Electronics is introducing the 'Mobility eXperience (MX) Platform' at CES 2025, integrating AI home features into vehicles. The platform utilizes AI and IoT to provide home-like convenience and comfort, transforming vehicles into multi-functional spaces with personalized experiences through 'LG ThinQon'.

articles.title: Samsung cellphones and iPhones cannot use WhatsApp in 2025, here is the list
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: WhatsApp will discontinue support for select older Android and iOS devices starting May 2025. This decision is driven by the app's evolution and the introduction of new AI-driven features requiring more sophisticated hardware. This change necessitates that users with older devices upgrade to maintain access to the messaging platform.

articles.title: Experience the Natural Benefits of Manyolo Male Enhancement NZ- 100% Safe & Effective
articles.author: Malebiotix999
articles.summary: Manyolo Gummies New Zealand, a new male enhancement supplement, is designed to improve sexual vitality and address erectile dysfunction. The product aims to enhance blood flow, increase testosterone levels, and improve endurance. It is available for purchase through the official website and select online retailers.

articles.title: LG Expands ‘AI Home Solutions' to Mobility at CES 2025
articles.author: K S Krishna
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching the LG Mobility Experience (MX) platform at CES 2025, showcased in the 'Lifestyle Solution for Mobility' concept vehicle. This platform integrates LG's smart life solutions, appliance hardware, and AI technologies to create a customizable space within vehicles, offering features like a media lounge or creative studio. The MX platform will also be offered as a subscription service.

articles.title: M&S Food launches campaign for new health and wellness ranges
articles.author: Angela Beevers
articles.summary: M&S Food has launched two new health and wellness ranges: Brain Food, developed in partnership with the British Nutrition Foundation, and YAY! Mushrooms, created in partnership with Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew. The marketing campaign promotes these ranges across TV, VOD, press, digital, and in-store channels, highlighting hero products like the Brain Ball and YAY! Mushrooms AM & PM Cold Pressed Shots.

articles.title: Jaspreet Bindra: Expect Agentic AI to make big waves in 2025
articles.author: Jaspreet Bindra
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing AI agents as new platforms and services. Microsoft with CoPilot Wave 2, Google with Gemini 2, AgentForce by Salesforce are building agents on top of LLMs. Minday finds restaurants, Relevance AI automates meetings, and Klarna uses customer service agents built on OpenAI, replacing human agents. These advancements indicate a shift towards service-as-a-software, transforming enterprise workflows.

articles.title: OnePlus Open 2 to Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold: Top 5 foldable phones to launch in 2025
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: In 2025, Motorola is expected to introduce the Razr 60 series, OnePlus the Open 2, and Samsung the Galaxy Z Fold7. These smartphone manufacturers are anticipated to release new foldable smartphone models featuring enhancements in functionality, appearance, and performance.

articles.title: I found a 55p 'better alternative' to Heinz tomato soup and now I'm stocking up for the new year
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Heinz Cream of Tomato Soup costs £1.70, containing 89% tomatoes and herb extracts. Lidl Tomato Soup costs 62p and is made with tomato puree, noted to be more watery. Morrisons Savers Tomato Soup impressed with its thick, creamy, sweet tomato flavour at 55p a can. Aldi Tomato Soup, despite its creamy consistency, was considered bland in comparison.

articles.title: 57 Things That Just May Make You Feel, Dare I Say, Adult-Like In 2025
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: The article showcases a range of products available on Amazon, from the Always Pan 2.0 with enhanced non-stick and oven-safe features to a Cosrx SPF 50+ sunscreen. It covers various categories, including home organization, beauty, and kitchenware, presenting each product with details and positive customer reviews.

articles.title: Oppo Find N5 Gets Certified Ahead of Launch
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Oppo is rumored to release a new foldable smartphone, currently known as the Oppo Find N5. This device might potentially be launched as the OnePlus Open 2. The two devices are expected to be virtually identical, suggesting a shared design and features for a new product line.

articles.title: 37 Unconventional Products That Could Have A Big Impact On Your 2025
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: NeeDoh launched "Dream Drop", a sensory fidget toy. Purity introduced "floating" air conduction headphones. Wititude is offering 2025 Day-to-Day Calendar. Kitchen Gizmos sells snap-on pasta strainer. Moodmatcher offers color-changing lipstick. Stealth Fitness launched Stealth core trainer. Pizza Pack specializes in sustainable food storage solutions. Mindsight sells calming personal care. Brightech specializes in home lighting. Fermentaholics launched pickling and kombucha starter kits. VIS Paradise Goods provides chic coffee cup holder. Sonic Alert sells alarm clocks. Crayola offers Air Dry Clay.

articles.title: What is an AI agent? A computer scientist explains the next wave of artificial intelligence tools
articles.author: Angelo Gonzales
articles.summary: Major technology companies, including OpenAI, Microsoft, Google and Salesforce, have recently released or announced plans to develop and release AI agents. Google demonstrated Project Mariner, a browser extension for Chrome that can reason about the text and images on your screen.  These agents aim to automate tasks and solve problems in various environments, representing advancements beyond traditional chatbots.

articles.title: Singer opens first-ever Samsung AI-powered smart store in Sri Lanka
articles.summary: Singer Sri Lanka, in partnership with Samsung, has launched the first AI-powered smart electronics store, named Samsung SmartThings store, in Sri Lanka on December 17, 2024. The store features a range of AI-powered devices, including smart TVs, refrigerators, washing machines, Galaxy smartphones, and home automation systems, aimed at providing smart living solutions and enhancing lifestyles through technology.

articles.title: Small town sales join the big league
articles.author: Writankar Mukherjee
articles.summary: NielsenIQ data shows smartphone sales in smaller towns rose to 53% in 2024. Tata Motors expanded to smaller towns by introducing SUV's which is gaining preference with customers.

articles.title: Dear customer, AI knows what you want before you do
articles.author: M Muneer
articles.summary: Amazon uses AI for personalised recommendations based on purchase history and browsing behavior. Spotify offers curated playlists like "Discover Weekly" tailored to listener tastes. Starbucks uses its mobile app to deliver location-specific offers and suggestions based on customer's purchase history. These companies use AI to provide hyper-personalisation of new services or updates to existing ones to enhance customer experience.

articles.title: LG Electronics to unveil AI-based mobility platform at CES 2025
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: LG Electronics plans to introduce a new product. The introduction indicates a launch or reveal of something new from the company.

articles.title: The Pocket Bidet(R) Unveils Its Latest Innovation, the Portable Bidet, Revolutionizing Personal Care with Eco-friendly, On-The-Go Hygiene Solution
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: The Pocket Bidet launched a new portable and eco-friendly bidet designed for active and eco-conscious individuals. This product aims to reduce reliance on disposable wipes and toilet paper, promoting personal well-being and environmental conservation. Consumers can purchase The Pocket Bidet from its Amazon store.

articles.title: LG PRESENTS VISION FOR EXPANDING ITS "AI HOME SOLUTIONS" INTO MOBILITY SPACES AT CES 2025
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: LG Electronics introduced the "Lifestyle Solution for Mobility" featuring the LG Mobility Experience (MX) platform at CES 2025. This platform integrates LG's smart home solutions into vehicles, creating a customizable experience space with features like a creator studio or business lounge. LG plans to offer the MX platform as a subscription service.

articles.title: LG PRESENTS VISION FOR EXPANDING ITS
articles.author: PR Newswire 2nd
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching the "Lifestyle Solution for Mobility" featuring the LG Mobility Experience (MX) platform at CES 2025. The MX platform integrates LG's smart life solutions into mobility spaces, offering a personalized lifestyle experience with features like customizable cabin spaces and integration of AI Home services. LG plans to offer the MX platform as a subscription service.

articles.title: Time-honored regional classics given new lease of life
articles.author: YANG FEIYUE
articles.summary: Xiaorehun introduced pear syrup lollipops, designed with traditional Chinese games, to attract new customers. Xiaorehun also opened a new factory offering tours and leased land for pear cultivation. Yu Wulin integrated local ethnic songs with rural tourism in Laomudeng village, offering folk performances to travelers.

articles.title: 'Missing You,' Netflix Show From Harlan Coben, Uses John Waite Title
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Netflix introduced a new show called 'Missing You'.

articles.title: You Can Get This Ecovacs Robot Vacuum and Mop for Just $330, but Only for Today
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: A robot vacuum and mop, featuring an auto-cleaning station, is available with a significant discount of $470.

articles.title: Introducing: Nomad Omni Data, A New Type of Internet
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Nomad Internet unveils Nomad Omni Data, a new upgrade designed to redefine internet performance and reliability, providing enhanced connectivity regardless of location. The new service aims to improve the user's connectivity experience.

articles.title: A new OnePlus phone just leaked with a ridiculous battery spec
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: OnePlus could launch a new phone.

articles.title: Beyond Llms: Pattern Introduces Patternde™: The First Online Pattern Discovery Engine™
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: Company launched online testing of its revolutionary proprietary pattern discovery technology. This technology transforms investigation, analysis, and modeling.

articles.title: Ozak: The Next Big Thing In Predictive AI With Native $OZ Token At $0.001
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Ozak AI launched a new platform that combines artificial intelligence.

articles.title: ZT Mining Launches Exclusive New Year Packages to Start 2025
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: A company is introducing two new cryptocurrency mining packages at the beginning of 2025. These packages are designed to cater to diverse user needs.

articles.title: Xiaomi Sound Outdoor Speaker Review: Bang For The Buck
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Xiaomi is launching the Xiaomi Sound Outdoor, a new budget Bluetooth speaker offering excellent value.
